item.title: Apple Continues Sports Push With Bid on MLB's Sunday Night Baseball
item.description: In an interview this week with CNBC’s Alex Sherman, MLB commissioner Rob Manfred confirmed that Apple, NBC, and ESPN have each bid on the media rights to MLB’s “Sunday Night Baseball” package, for the
